title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.71 - Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.71 - Authority

State Regulations

Authority for issuance of the rules and regulations set
forth herein, sections
651.70
-651.77, inclusive, is
contained in section 1210 of the Public Health Law and in chapter 1162, Laws of
1971. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
651.71

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
